lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.question: After feeding the 5,000, what did Jesus tell the disciples to do?
answers: Sail across the Sea of Galilee

questions.question: What did Jesus do while the disciples sailed across the sea?
Why was it difficult for the disciples to sail across the sea?
answers: They struggled against the wind and waves
They were lost in the fog
The boat was too heavy with fish

questions.question: What amazing thing did the disciples see?
When they saw Jesus walking on the water, what did the disciples thing it was?
What did Peter say to Jesus?
answers: If it’s really You, tell me to come to You on the water
Get in the boat before you drown

questions.question: When Jesus told Peter to come, what happened?
answers: Peter was too scared to leave the boat

questions.question: When Peter saw the waves and began to doubt, what happened?
answers: He began to sink, but Jesus rescued him

questions.question: What happened to the storm when they got back into the boat?
When they got back into the boat, what did the disciples say?
answers: Truly You are the Son of God
